title: Spatial Mobility Reasoning and CAL-Based Mathematics Learning Design Using Path Narrative Documents

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (coordinate systems, vectors) and spatial reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Customized educational environments for enhancing the job application capabilities of current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can convert spatial movement patterns in route narratives into linguistic/geometric models.
Learners can design spatial reasoning algorithms applicable to real-world work scenarios using CAL tools.
Learners can explain the process of solving multi-path optimization problems in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
